snippet.textDisplay:
Dr lam diagonised with gout. My age is 37 with no cormorbidities. Recently i gained around 4 kg due to lack of activities in this pandemic time. I had pain in achillies tendon joint in both legs during walking daily. After having various tablets
and physiotheraphy (US Therapy) for 10days I got temporary releif from pain. But soon after resuming my walking I had the same pain in my legs and went to dr and took blood tests and diagonised hyperuricemia. Now lam taking
FEBUXOSTAT 40mg tablet twice daily for the past 20days. But my pain is not yet subsided. While playing badminton lam feeling the pain in my right elbow joint also.. By seeing your video lam worried sir. when the pain will go off..? If uric acid crystals have already been formed in my leg and elbow joint, then how long it will take
to dissove and I can carry my regular workouts.? lam intensely following low purine diet and keen in loosing weight also…. How long it will take for my condition to get rid of pain..?Dr pls answer my question Sir.?
